static_fields.headline: Blue Urushi Silver Maki-e Dial for DIVIDO | Minase watches | Handmade in Japan
static_fields.author.name: kellyhenriksen
static_fields.description: Minase’s latest creation in the Divido collection pays tribute to Japan’s finest traditional crafts. Following on from the success of the blue hand-lackered dial of the regular serie, Minase is lauching a more special and artisanal version, a deep blue Urushi silver maki-e dial. Handcrafted in the studio of Urushi master Megumi Shimamoto, in Kyoto, this new dial is a gift for the eye.
static_fields.name: Blue Urushi Silver Maki-e Dial for DIVIDO | Minase watches | Handmade in Japan
